oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Etherton & Loveday, Market House, ca. 1922
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: unknown
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Interior view of the Etherton & Loveday stall in the Market House, Knoxville, TN, ca. 1922. L-r: ____ Loveday, Clay Loveday, Mamie Woody, and Charles Inman Etherton. Mr. Etherton was co-owner of the food stall which was bordered on both sides by a fish market. Etherton & Loveday was a food stall that sold butter, eggs, chow chow, and other items.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Markets; Grocers;
